announcements.message: Closing Ceremony WSDC 2017 live streaming at http://tve.kemdikbud.go.id
The Champion of WSDC 2017 is Singapore. CONGRATULATION!
Watch the grand final round of WSDC 2017 Bali between Singapore vs England live at tve.kemdikbud.go.id, 15.00 PM (UTC+8.00).
GF motion: This House supports restrictions on free speech to combat the rise of right-wing populism.
Mlungisi Dlamini, Jana Gilke, Kevin Moar, Ameera Natasha Moore, Julio Meyer, Karin Merckens, Yoni Cohen-Idov.
Congratulations for the following panelists, who will be judging today's WSDC 2017 Grand Final alongside Kip Oebanda and Aisha Ahmad:
The Tournament Committee Meeting will take place in Tabanan room, 4th floor at 9 AM.
Motion for SF: TH Prefers a benevolent dictatorship over a weak democracy.
Motion for the Quarterfinals: THW impose additional taxes on employers who use automation to replace human workers.
Julio, Theodore, Sharukh, Ameera, Karin, Jesus, Fil, Lisa, Ashish, James Stratton, Luis, Mark Gabriel, Agrim. (2/2)
Aisha, Kip, Lunga, Tamara, Jana, George, Scott, Yoni, Dena, Tasneem, Milky, Joshua, Alif, Kevin Moar, Menno. (1/2)
List of judges for Quarter Finals & Semi Finals:
Motion for OF: THW Supports Military Retaliation Against Cyber Attacks.
Motion for PDO: THW Legalize Surrogate Motherhood For Profit.
All teams competing in PDOs please be ready by 9 AM at the ballroom for departure to the venue.
Other participants wishing to watch the PDOs and/or Octofinals may choose to leave with either group of buses at 9 AM or 12.30 PM.
All breaking judges must leave with the morning buses leaving at 9 AM.
All teams competing in Octofinals may choose to leave for the venue at 9 AM or 12.30 PM.
THBT states should be able to prioritize asylum seekers on the basis of cultural similarity with the existing population.
Motion for preliminary round 8:
THBT The NATO Enhanced Forward Presence in Eastern Europe does more harm than good.
All team managers please come to TCE Meeting at Denpasar Room 3rd Floor 7.30 PM.
Round 6: THBT when working to preserve rare and endangered species, private entities are more effective than the state.
There are some important updates related to today's matches. Please refer to the board in front of the ball room.
Don't forget to post your WSDC 2017 experiences in Instagram and find us at @wsdc2017bali.
All judges please fill in your ADJUDICATION BALLOT correctly.
Please do not forget to submit your feedback forms (judge to judge and coach to judge).
THBT states should not erect statues or memorials which commemorate or glorify military campaigns or the service of soldiers in war.
The motion for preliminary round 4 is:
There are some important updates related to today's matches. Please refer to the board in front of the ball room.
Bus 1 to 8 will head to SMA 1, bus 9-16 will head to SMA 7. Please follow your LO's instructions.
There has been an update of the judges pairing for Round 1 and Round 2. Please refer to the board in front of the ballroom.
Stream the Opening Ceremony of WSDC 2017 in Bali, Indonesia on tve.kemdikbud.go.id!
First bus for opening ceremony will leave at 4.30 from the main lobby. The last bus will leave at 5.30. Please follow your LO instruction.
Please come to the TEAM MANAGERS MEETING at 4.00 PM in Denpasar Room, 3rd Floor.
Ghana and Tunisia have confirmed that they are withdrawing from WSDC 2017.
Welcome to Bali! If you need any assistance, please find contact information from the Info section of this app.

Common Indonesian Phrases

  • I - Saya
  • You - Kamu
  • We - Kami
  • They - Mereka
  • He / She - Dia
  • Welcome - Selamat Datang
  • Hello (general greeting) - Apa kabar?
  • Hello (on phone) - Halo
  • How are you? - Apa kabar?
  • Reply to 'How are you?' - Baik
  • Long time no see - Lama tidak bertemu
  • What's your name? - Siapa nama anda?
  • My name is... - Nama saya...
  • Where are you from? - Anda berasal dari mana?
  • I'm from... - Saya berasal dari...
  • Pleased to meet you - Senang bertemu dengan Anda
  • Good Morning - Selamat Pagi
  • Good Afternoon - Selamat Siang
  • Good Evening - Selamat Malam
  • Good bye - Sampai jumpa
  • Good luck! - Semoga berhasil!
  • Have a nice day - Semoga harimu menyenangkan
  • Have a nice meal - Selamat makan
  • Have a good journey - Selamat jalan
  • I love you - Saya cinta kamu
  • I miss you - Saya rindu kamu
  • Get well soon - Semoga cepat sembuh
  • Excuse me - Permisi
  • Where's the toilet? - Dimanakah toilet?
  • How much is this? - Berapa harganya?
  • Sorry - Maaf
  • Please - Tolong
  • Thank you - Terima kasih

Credits

This app was made by WSDC 2017 Organizing Comittee in collaboration with the DNArtworks team, including:

  • Pascal Alfadian Nugroho
  • Daniel Rahadian Nugroho
  • Tommy Adhitya The
  • Edina Margaret
  • Kresna Dwi Cahyo
  • Prayogo Cendra

App is insipired from WSDC 2016 Stuttgart app by Marius Petcu.
